conbody.p: As an operator, you can use the Work Queue module for maintaining a list of operations that you must perform, and report the status of completion of each operation.

Each row in the work queue represents an operation to be performed. By default, the work queue contains the operations that are ready or in progress and meet at least one of the following criteria:
Operations assigned to you
Operations in which you have clocked on at least one serial numberYou can add additional operations that are ready or in progress to the work queue.

Using the Work Queue module, you can perform the following tasks:
Add a list of operations to the work queue.
View a list of operations that are assigned to you and are available.
Clock on and off a serial number.
Specify the number of BOM items consumed for each serial number.
View the status of an operation.
View a list of documents related to an operation.
Provide quality variables data for each serial number.
Specify whether you have completed working on a serial number.
